meanings.definition: A student in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The young collegian attended classes diligently.
meanings.sent2: The collegian studied hard for the upcoming exams.
meanings.sent3: The collegian accidentally walked into the wrong classroom and ended up in a physics lecture instead of history.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated collegian, always eager to expand her knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The collegian's passion for learning was truly inspiring to others.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a college or its students.
meanings.sent1: The collegian dormitories were buzzing with activity during exam week.
meanings.sent2: The collegian council organized a fun event for the entire campus.
meanings.sent3: The collegian fashion show featured trendy outfits inspired by campus life.
meanings.sent4: Her collegian spirit shone through in every aspect of her academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The collegian atmosphere on campus was vibrant and full of energy.
